productOverview.name: ShiftAI Scheduler
productOverview.tagline: AI-Powered Staff Scheduling: Cut Overtime by 30%+ While Ensuring 90%+ Service Coverage
productOverview.targetUsers: Non-technical managers of small-to-medium service businesses (5-50 staff), e.g., cafes with high-volume walk-ins, spas with appointments, retail shops.
productOverview.valueProp: Uses ML demand forecasting and constraint optimization to auto-generate optimal weekly schedules at 15-min granularity, minimizing labor costs (25-40% overtime reduction), ensuring >90% demand coverage, and promoting fair rotations—outperforming manual scheduling and tools like Deputy/Homebase. Freemium for <10 staff.

features.name: Demand Forecasting
features.description: ML time-series models (Prophet/LSTM) predict hourly demand for next 7 days with 80-95% confidence intervals, incorporating historical data, weather, events, and sensors. Scalable to 10-500 staff/multi-locations.

features.name: Staff Optimization
features.description: Constraint-based solver (Google OR-Tools/PuLP ILP) generates minimal-cost schedules respecting availability, skills, wages, max shifts (8h), rest (11h), absences (10-20% buffer), min ratios (1:10 staff:customers), equitable rotations (bias-free via randomization/fairness constraints), and regulations (EU WTD/union rules). Fuzzy skills matching with fallbacks.

features.name: Interactive Schedule Editor
features.description: Drag-and-drop calendar for manual tweaks, overrides, and previews. Supports A/B vs. manual schedules.

features.name: Onboarding & Data Import
features.description: Wizard for quick setup with drag-and-drop uploads and API integrations. Ethical: Anonymize data, ensure fair assignments.

features.name: Analytics & KPIs
features.description: Dashboard tracks savings, service levels, NPS. Simulations validate vs. historical manual schedules.

uiMockups.description: Overview with upcoming schedule preview, key KPIs (overtime savings, coverage), and quick actions.
Visual demand curves with confidence bands, editable inputs.
Drag-and-drop grid (15-min slots) with staff cards, cost sidebar.
Step-by-step: Upload data → Set rules → Review first schedule.
Charts for ROI, NPS, with A/B comparisons.

stack.ai: Prophet/LSTM (scikit-learn/TensorFlow) for forecasting; OR-Tools/PuLP for optimization

technicalArchitecture.dataFlow: User uploads/integrations → ETL pipeline (Pandas/Airflow) → ML forecast → Solver optimization → Frontend render/export. Caching (Redis) for simulations; SOC2/GDPR via encrypted storage (Postgres/AWS RDS). Scalable via serverless (Lambda).

kpis.name: Overtime Reduction
kpis.benchmark: 25-40% vs. manual (e.g., cafe: $450 AI vs. $650 manual, 31% savings)

metricsAndROI.pilotExample: 10-staff cafe: Lunch peak 50 cust/hr → AI: 3 basic +1 advanced barista ($450 cost, 90% coverage, no overtime) vs. manual ($650, 15% understaffed). 31% savings, validated via A/B simulation.
